creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Julian Baird
description: cruet stand; four bottles with stoppers
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

On the center of the stand in engraved a crest and motto, [Floreat qui Laborat] which means \"those who labor flourish\", perhaps for Ross.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of base.  Maker\'s mark on central handle shaft.  Lion passant, date letter, and sovereign\'s head on upper side of handle shaft.
title: Cordial set
